segments.text: Over to the left, I see a boy on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Heâ€™s reaching into a "COOKIE JAR" in an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His body is stretched upward, clearly focused on the prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand is in the jar, while the other holds a plate, perhaps to catch the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool, it looks incredibly unstable, legs splayed and tilted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It could tip backward at any moment, sending him crashing down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him falling gives me a real jolt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems so confident, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a classic secret mission, and he's totally committed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember sneaking cookies as a child; it brings back fond memories.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's funny how children find ways to get what they want, even dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he manages to get his cookies without an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is truly a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
